steps.title: Start by drawing a curved oval shape.
steps.content: Start by drawing a curved oval shape. Try to make the right side bigger than the left. This will serve as the body of the brinjal.

steps.title: Over the left end of the oval shape draw a semicircle.
steps.content: Over the left end of the oval shape draw a semicircle. Add a couple of spikes to give it shape. This will be the cap of the brinjal.

steps.title: Draw a stem-like shape on top of the cap.
steps.content: Draw a stem-like shape on top of the cap. This will be the brinjal's stem.

steps.title: Go over the outline of the aubergine.
steps.content: Go over the outline of the aubergine. Use a sharp pencil or a dark felt tip pen. Erase any pencil lines that you don't need.

steps.title: Add in color.
steps.content: Add in color. Use shades of purple for the body and shades of green and grey for the cap and stem.
